005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.AbstractCodedMetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnResolveUri;
010
011/**
012 * FONS: Exceptions related to function namespaces.
013 */
014public class UriFunctionException
015    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
016  /**
017   * <a href=
018   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFONS0004">err:FONS0004</a>:
019   * Raised by <a href=
020   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-resolve-QName">fn:resolve-QName</a>
021   * and analogous functions if a supplied QName has a prefix that has no binding
022   * to a namespace.
023   */
024  public static final int NO_NAMESPACE_FOUND_FOR_PREFIX = 4;
025  /**
026   * <a href=
027   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFONS0005">err:FONS0005</a>:
028   * Raised by {@link FnResolveUri} if no base URI is available for resolving a
029   * relative URI.
030   */
031  public static final int BASE_URI_NOT_DEFINED_IN_STATIC_CONTEXT = 5;
032
033  /**
034   * the serial version UID.
035   */
036  private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
037
038  /**
039   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
040   * and no cause.
041   *
042   * @param code
043   *          the error code value
044   * @param message
045   *          the exception message
046   */
047  public UriFunctionException(int code, String message) {
048    super(code, message);
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
053   * and {@code cause}.
054   *
055   * @param code
056   *          the error code value
057   * @param message
058   *          the exception message
059   * @param cause
060   *          the original exception cause
061   */
062  public UriFunctionException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
063    super(code, message, cause);
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
068   * the {@code cause}.
069   *
070   * @param code
071   *          the error code value
072   * @param cause
073   *          the original exception cause
074   */
075  public UriFunctionException(int code, Throwable cause) {
076    super(code, cause);
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  public String getCodePrefix() {
081    return "FONS";
082  }
083
084}
